page.title: 02CLUBS IN THE AREA.
page.content: We have these clubs for the YOUNG CHILDREN:brownies and play groups. These are the clubs for CHILDREN who are still at school:boys club,tennis,motor-bike club,guides ,youth-clubs, canoeing, gymastics, synchronised swimming and yoga. Our GROWN UPS have plenty of clubs to occupy them:old-time dancing,canoeing,bowling club,scooter club,keep fit club,old folks club,synchronised swimming. ALL AGES group clubs:Athletics-club, swimming, kung-fu,karate, judo, rugby, badminton, weight lifting, break dancing and numerous social clubs and public houses. With large unemployment in the area(over 15%) it is important that there are many clubs to occupy our leisure time and we are very fortunate in our area that all age groups are well catered for.
